channel.title: Show and filter all created Queries from Users
channel.description:
### Issue Summary We have currently over 1000 queries created with several users in our self hosted redash installation. It is getting harder to find or filter our queries. For example: We would like to filter our queries by creator. Is that possible?
### Technical details:
* Redash Version: Version: 8.0.1+b33387 (cd13c978) * Browser/OS: Chrome Version 80.0.3987.149 (Official Build) (64-Bit); macOS 10.14.6 * How did you install Redash: Container

item.title: Show and filter all created Queries from Users
item.dc:creator: nkgokul
item.description:
This would be very useful as there are thousands of queries created now and filter by user would come handy.

Read full topic

item.title: Show and filter all created Queries from Users
item.dc:creator: koreist
item.description:
Is this request still alive? This would be hugely helpful, my team has hundreds of queries. I have to save each or ping my team members to get the source, which is especially no fun on a holiday week.

Read full topic
item.source: Show and filter all created Queries from Users

item.title: Show and filter all created Queries from Users
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
Yeah the rudimentary search function is getting long in the tooth. We would certainly review a PR for this.

Meanwhile, I moved your post to the feature request category so members can vote for it.

Read full topic

item.title: Show and filter all created Queries from Users
item.dc:creator: Rob
item.description:
Issue Summary

We have currently over 1000 queries created with several users in our self hosted redash installation. It is getting harder to find or filter our queries.
For example: We would like to filter our queries by creator. Is that possible?

Technical details:

  • Redash Version: Version: 8.0.1+b33387 (cd13c978)
  • Browser/OS: Chrome Version 80.0.3987.149 (Official Build) (64-Bit); macOS 10.14.6
  • How did you install Redash: Container
